name: Phoenix Wright: 9 Hours, 9 Persons, 9 Doors
description:
9 years ago, 9-year-old Miles Edgeworth disappeared without a trace.

Now, college student Phoenix Wright has been kidnapped and put on a sinking ship with 8 other people, including his long-lost friend. There, the enigmatic "Zero" forces them all to play the diabolical Nonary Game where they must put their lives on the line... over and over and over again.

This is a not-for-profit fangame.
Zero Escape: The Nonary Games (c) Spike Chunsoft Co., Ldt.
